GV05brupsb5u:131: tatra khamiti bhautike khe pratītirmā bhūdityāha-khaṃ purāṇaṃ ciratanaṃ khaṃ paramātmākāśamityarthaḥ /

GV05brupsb5u:341: evaṃ satyabāhulyaṃ sarvasya mṛtyoranṛtasyākiñcitkaratvaṃ ca yo vidvāṃstamevaṃ vidvāṃsamanṛtaṃ kadācitpramādoktaṃ na hinasti //1//
GV05brupsb5u:343: tad yat tat satyam asau sa ādityaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:344: ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣo yaś cāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣas tāv etāv anyo 'nyasmin pratiṣṭhitau /
GV05brupsb5u:345: raśmibhir eṣo 'smin pratiṣṭhitaḥ prāṇair ayam amuṣmin /
GV05brupsb5u:346: sa yadotkramiṣyan bhavati śuddham evaitan maṇḍalaṃ paśyati /
GV05brupsb5u:348: BrhUpBh_5,5.2 asyādhunā satyasya brahmaṇaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣa upāsanamucyate-tadyat /
GV05brupsb5u:349: kiṃ tatsatyaṃ brahma prathamajaṃ kimasau saḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:350: ko 'sāvādityaḥ kaḥ punarasāvādityo ya eṣa ka eṣa ya etasminnādityamaṇḍale puruṣo 'bhimānī so 'sau satyaṃ brahma /
GV05brupsb5u:353: tāvetāvādityākṣisthau puruṣāvekasya satyasya brahmaṇaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣau yasmāttasmādanyonyasminnitaretarasminnādityaścākṣuṣe cākṣuṣaścā'ditye pratiṣṭhitau /
GV05brupsb5u:355: kathaṃ pratiṣṭhitāvityucyate raśmibhiḥ prakāśenānugrahaṃ kurvanneṣa ādityo 'smiṃścākṣuṣe 'dhyātme pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:357: so 'smiñcharīre vijñānamayo bhoktā yadā yasminkāla utkramiṣyanbhavati tadāsau cākṣuṣa ādityapuruṣo raśmīnupasaṃhṛtya kevalenaudāsīnyena rūpeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb5u:358: tadāyaṃ vijñānamayaḥ paśyati śuddhameva kevalaṃ viraśmyetanmaṇḍalaṃ candramaṇḍalamiva /
GV05brupsb5u:361: nainaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ puruṣamurarīkṛtya taṃ pratyanugrahāyaite raśmayaḥ svāmikartavyavaśātpūrvamāgacchanto 'pi punastatkarmakṣayamanurudhyamānā iva nopayanti na pratyāgacchantyenam /
GV05brupsb5u:364: ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣas tasya bhūr iti śiraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:371: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,5.3 //
GV05brupsb5u:372: BrhUpBh_5,5.3 tatra yo 'sau ko ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ satyanāmā tasya vyāhṛtayo 'vayavāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:374: bhūriti yeyaṃ vyāhṛtiḥ sā tasya śiraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:376: tatra sāmānyaṃ svayamevāha śruti-ekamekasaṃkhyāyiktaṃ śirastathaitadakṣaramekaṃ bhūriti /
GV05brupsb5u:377: bhuva iti bāhū dvitvasāmānyāddvau bāhū dve ete akṣare /
GV05brupsb5u:378: tathā svariti pratiṣṭhā dve pratiṣṭhe dve ete akṣare /
GV05brupsb5u:382: kāsāvityāha - ahariti ahariti caitadrūpaṃ hanterjahāteśceti yo veda sa hanti jahāti ca pāpmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda //3//
GV05brupsb5u:384: yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣas tasya bhūr iti śiraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:391: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,5.4 //
GV05brupsb5u:392: BrhUpBh_5,5.4 evaṃ yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣastasya bhūriti śira ityādi sarvaṃ samānam /
GV05brupsb5u:399: tasminn antar hṛdaye yathā vrīhir vā yavo vā /
GV05brupsb5u:400: sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvam idaṃ praśāsti yad idaṃ kiñca // BrhUp_5,6.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:401: BrhUpBh_5,6.1 upādhīnāmanekatvādanekaviśeṣaṇatvācca tasyaiva prakṛtasya brahmaṇo manaupādhiviśiṣṭasyopāsanaṃ vidhitsannāhamanomayo manaḥprāyo manasyupalabhyamānatvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:402: manasā copalabhata iti manomayo 'yaṃ puruṣo bhāḥ satyo bhā eva satyaṃ sadbhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ bhāḥ satyo bhāsvara ityetat /
GV05brupsb5u:405: yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā pariṇamata evaṃ parimāṇastasminnantarhṛdaye yogibhirdṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:406: sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasya svabhedajātasyeśānaḥ svāmī /
GV05brupsb5u:407: svāmitve 'pi sati kaścidamātyāditantro 'yaṃ tu na tathā kiṃ tarhyadhipatiradhiṣṭhāya pālayitā /
GV05brupsb5u:408: sarvamidaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ kiñca yatkiñccitsarvaṃ jagattatsarvaṃ praśāsti /
GV05brupsb5u:410: taṃ tathā yathepāsate tadeva bhavatīti brāhmaṇam //1//
GV05brupsb5u:415: vidyaty enaṃ pāpmano ya evaṃ veda vidyud brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:417: BrhUpBh_5,7.1 tathaivopāsanāntaraṃ satyasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭaphalamārabhyate - vidyudbrahmetyāhuḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:418: vidyuto brahmaṇo nirvacanamucyate - vidānādavakhaṇḍanāttamaso medhāndhakāraṃ vidārya hyavabhāsate 'to vidyut /
GV05brupsb5u:419: evaṃ guṇaṃ vidyudbrahmeti yo vedāsai vidyatyavakhaṇḍayati vināśayati pāpmana enamātmānaṃ prati pratikūlabhūtāḥ pāpmāno ye tānsarvānpāpmano 'khaṇḍayatītyarthaḥ
GV05brupsb5u:420: ya evaṃ veda vidyudbrahmeti tasyānurūpaṃ phalam /
GV05brupsb5u:431: tasyāḥ prāṇa ṛṣabho mano vatsaḥ // BrhUp_5,8.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:432: BrhUpBh_5,8.1 punarupāsanāntaraṃ tasyaiva brahmaṇo vāgvai brahmeti vāgiti śabdasrayī
GV05brupsb5u:433: tāṃ vācaṃ dhenuṃ dhenuriva dhenuryathā dhenuścaturbhiḥ stanaiḥ stanyaṃ payaḥ kṣarati
GV05brupsb5u:434: vatsāyaivaṃ vāgdhenurvakṣyamāṇaiḥ stanaiḥ paya ivānnaṃ kṣarati devādibhyaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:435: ke punaste stanā ye vā te yebhyaḥ kṣarati /
GV05brupsb5u:436: tasyā etasyā vāco dhenvā dvau stanau devā upajīvanti vatsasthānīyāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:445: hanteti manuṣyebhyo 'nnaṃ prayacchanti svadhākāraṃ ca vaṣaṭkāraṃ ca /
GV05brupsb5u:460: ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe /
GV05brupsb5u:465: sa yadotkramiṣyan bhavati nainaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti // BrhUp_5,9.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:473: yaṃ ghoṣametaditi kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ karṇāvapidhāyāṅgulībhyāmapidhānaṃ kṛtvā śṛṇoti taṃ prajāpatimupāsīta vaiśvānaramagnim /
GV05brupsb5u:475: tatra prāsaṅgikamidamariṣṭalakṣaṇamucyate-so 'tra śarīre bhoktā yadotkramiṣyanbhavati nainaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti //1//
GV05brupsb5u:478: yadā vai puruṣo 'smāl lokāt praiti sa vāyum āgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:479: tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya kham /
GV05brupsb5u:491: BrhUpBh_5,10.1 sarveṣāmasminprakaraṇa upāsanānāṃ gatiriyaṃ phalaṃ cocyate-yadā vai
GV05brupsb5u:492: puruṣo vidvānasmāllokātpraiti śarīraṃ parityajati sa tadā vāyumāgacchatyantarikṣe
GV05brupsb5u:494: sa vāyustatra svātmani tasmai samprāptāya vijihote svātmāvayavānvigamayati cchidrīkarotyātmānamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:496: ucyate-yathā ratha vakrasya khaṃ chidraṃ prasiddhaparimāṇam /
GV05brupsb5u:497: tena chidreṇa sa vidvānūrdhva ākramata ūrdhvaḥ sangacchati sa ādityamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:498: ādityo brahmalokaṃ jigamiṣormārganirodhaṃ kṛtvā sthitaḥ so 'pyevaṃvida upāsakāya dvāraṃ prayacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:500: yathā lambarasya khaṃ vāditraviśeṣasya cchidraparimāmaṃ tena sa ūrdhva ākramate sa candramasamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:502: yathā dundubheḥ khaṃ prasiddhaṃ tena sa ūrdhva ākramate sa lokaṃ prajāpatilokamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:506: taṃ prāpya tasminvasati śāśvatīrnityāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarānityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:510: etad vai paramaṃ tapo yad vyāhitas tapyate /
GV05brupsb5u:511: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:512: etad vai paramaṃ tapo yaṃ pretam araṇyaṃ haranti /
GV05brupsb5u:513: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:514: etad vai paramaṃ tapo yaṃ pretam agnāv abhyādadhati /
GV05brupsb5u:515: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,11.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:518: yadyāhito vyādhito jvarādiparigṛhītaḥ sanyattapyate tadetatparamaṃ tapa ityevaṃ cintayet /
GV05brupsb5u:520: tasyaivaṃ cintayato viduṣaḥ karmakṣayahetustadeva tapo bhavatyanindato 'viṣīdataḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:521: sa eva ca tena vijñānatapasā dagdhakilbaṣaḥ paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:524: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:533: ete ha tv eva devate ekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ gacchataḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:535: kiṃ svid evaivaṃ viduṣe sādhu kuryāṃ kim evāsmā asādhu kuryām iti /
GV05brupsb5u:536: sa ha smāha pāṇinā mā prātṛda /
GV05brupsb5u:537: kas tv enayor ekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ gacchatīti /
GV05brupsb5u:544: sarvāṇi ha vā asmin bhūtāni viśanti /
GV05brupsb5u:545: sarvāṇi bhūtāni ramante ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,12.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:547: tathaitadupāsanāntaraṃ vidhitsannāha-annaṃ brahmānnamadyate yattadbrahmetyeka ācāryā āhustanna tathā grahītavyamannaṃ brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:548: anye cā'huḥ prāṇo brahmeti tacca tathā na grahītavyam /
GV05brupsb5u:550: yasmātpūyati klidyate pūtibhāvamāpadyata ṛte prāṇāttatkathaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GV05brupsb5u:558: ata ekaikasya brahmatā nopapadyate yasmāttasmādete ha tvevānnaprāṇadevate ekadhābhūyamekadhābāvaṃ bhūtvā gatvā paramatāṃ paramatvaṃ gacchato brahmatvaṃ prāpnutaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:559: tadetadevamadhyavasya ha smā'ha sma prātṛdo nāma pitarātmanaḥ kiṃsviditisviditi vitarke /
GV05brupsb5u:560: yathā mayā brahma parikalpitamevaṃ viduṣe kiṃsvitsādhu kuryāṃ sādhu śobhanaṃ pūjāṃ kāṃ tvasmai kuryāmityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:562: annaprāṇau sahabhūto brahmeti vidvānnāsāvasādhukaramena khaṇḍito bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:564: tadevaṃvādinaṃ sa pitā ha smā'ha pāṇinā hastena nivārayanmā prātṛda maivaṃ vocaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:565: kastvenayorannaprāṇayorekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ kastu gacchati na kaścidapi vidvānanena brahmadarśanena paramatāṃ gacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:573: anne hi yasmādimāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni viṣṭānyāśritānyato 'nnaṃ vītyucyate /
GV05brupsb5u:581: yadā tvāyatanavānprāṇī balavāṃśca tadā kṛtārthamātmānaṃ manyamāno ramate lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:583: idānīmevaṃvidaḥ phalamāha - sarvāṇi ha vā asminbhūtāni viśantyannaguṇajñānātsarvāṇi bhūtāni ramante prāṇaguṇajñānādya evaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:590: ukthasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:596: prāṇaśca pradhāna indriyāṇāmukthaṃ ca śasrāṇāmata ukthamityupāsīta /
GV05brupsb5u:597: kathaṃ prāṇa ukthamityāha-prāṇo hi yasmādidaṃ sarvamutthāpayati /
GV05brupsb5u:600: tadupāsanaphalamāha-uddhāsmādevaṃvida ukthavitprāṇavidvīraḥ putra uttiṣṭhati ha dṛṣṭametatphalam /
GV05brupsb5u:601: adṛṣṭaṃ tūkthasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:607: yajuṣaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.2 //
GV05brupsb5u:615: hāsmā evaṃvide sarvāṇi bhūtāni śraiṣṭhyaṃ śreṣṭhabhāvastasmai śraiṣṭhyāya śreṣṭhabhāvāya naḥ śreṣṭho bhavediti /
GV05brupsb5u:621: samyañci hāsmai sarvāṇi bhūtāni śraiṣṭhyāya kalpante /
GV05brupsb5u:622: sāmnaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.3 //
GV05brupsb5u:626: prāṇe hi yasmātsarvāṇi bhūtāni samyañci saṃgacchante saṃgamanātsāmyāpattihetutvātsāma prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:628: na kevalaṃ saṃgacchanta eva śreṣṭhabhāvāya cāsmai kalpante samarthyante /
GV05brupsb5u:636: kṣatrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.4 //
GV05brupsb5u:638: prāṇau vai kṣattraṃ prasiddhametatprāṇo hi vai kṣattram /
GV05brupsb5u:640: kathaṃ prasiddhatetyāha-trāyate pālayatyenaṃ piṇḍaṃ dehaṃ prāṇaḥ kṣaṇitoḥ śasrādihiṃsitātpunarmāṃsenā'pūrayati yasmāttasmātkṣatatrāṇātprasiddhaṃ kṣattratvaṃ prāṇasya /
GV05brupsb5u:641: vidvatphalamāha-pra kṣattramatraṃ na trāyate 'nyena kenacidityatraṃ kṣattraṃ prāṇaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:643: kṣattrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //4//
GV05brupsb5u:646: bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur ity aṣṭāv akṣarāṇi /
GV05brupsb5u:647: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brupsb5u:649: sa yāvad eṣu triṣu lokeṣu tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:654: prāṇātmabhūtā ca sā sarvacchandasāṃ cā'tmā prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:659: gāyatryā brāhmaṇamasṛjata triṣṭubhā rājanyaṃ jagatyā vaiśyamati dvijottamasya dvitīyaṃ janma gāyatrīnimittam /
GV05brupsb5u:660: tasmātpradhānā gāyatrī brāhmaṇā vyutthāya brāhmaṇā abhivadanti sa brāhmaṇo vipāpo virajo 'vicikitso brāhmaṇo bhavatītyuttamapuruṣārthasaṃbandhaṃ brāhmaṇasya darśayati /
GV05brupsb5u:661: tacca brāhmaṇatvaṃ gāyatrījanmamūlamato vaktavyaṃ gāyatryāḥ satattvam /
GV05brupsb5u:662: gāyatryā hi yaḥ sṛṣṭo dvijottamo niraṅkuśa evottamapuruṣārthasādhane 'dhikriyate 'tastanmūlaḥ paramapuruṣārthasaṃbandhaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:668: etadu haivaitadevāsyā gāyatryāḥ padaṃ pādaḥ prathamo bhūmyādilakṣaṇasrailokyātmā /
GV05brupsb5u:670: evametattrailokyātmakaṃ gāyatryāḥ prathamaṃ padaṃ yo vedatasyaitatphalam-sa vidvānyāvatkiñcideṣu triṣu jetavyaṃ tāvatsarvaṃ ha jayati yo 'syā etadevaṃ padaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:673: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /

GV05brupsb5u:676: BrhUpBh_5,14.2 tadarco yajūṃsi sāmānīti trayīvidyānāmākṣarāṇyetānyapyaṣṭāveva tathaivāṣṭākṣaraṃ
GV05brupsb5u:677: ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padaṃ dvitīyametadu haivāsyā etadṛgyajuḥsāmalakṣaṇamaṣṭākṣaratvasāmānyādeva /
GV05brupsb5u:678: sa yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā trayyā vidyayā yāvatphalajātamāpyate tāvaddha jayati yo 'syā etadgāyatryāsraividyalakṣaṇaṃ padaṃ veda //2//
GV05brupsb5u:681: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brupsb5u:683: sa yāvad idaṃ prāṇi tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:684: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /

GV05brupsb5u:687: parorajā iti sarvam u hy evaiṣa raja upary upari tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:688: evaṃ haiva śriyā yaśasā tapati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.3 //
GV05brupsb5u:689: BrhUpBh_5,14.3 tathā prāṇo 'pāno vyāna etānyapi prāṇādyabhidhānākṣarāṇyaṣṭau /
GV05brupsb5u:690: tacca gāyatryāstṛtīyaṃ padaṃ yāvadidaṃ prāṇijātaṃ tāvaddha jayati yo 'syā etadevaṃ gāyatryāstṛtīyaṃ padaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:691: athānantaraṃ gāyatryāsripadāyāḥ śabdātmikāyāsturīyaṃ padamucyate 'bhidheyabhūtamasyāḥ prakṛtāyā gāyatryā etadeva vakṣyamāmaṃ turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:692: turīyamityādivākyapadārthaṃ svameva vyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-yadvai caturthaṃ prasiddhaṃ loke tadidaṃ turīyaśabdenābhidhīyate /
GV05brupsb5u:693: darśataṃ padamityasya kor'tha ityucyate-dadṛśa iva dṛśyata iva hyeṣa maṇḍalasthaḥ puruṣo rajo rajojātaṃ samastaṃ lokamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:698: yeṣāmupariṣṭātsavitā dṛśyate tadviṣaya eva sarvaśabdaḥ syādityāśaṅkānivṛttyarthā vīpsā /
GV05brupsb5u:699: “ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakānāṃ ca“iti śrutyanrāt /
GV05brupsb5u:701: yathāsau savitā sarvādhipatyalakṣaṇayā śriyā yaśasā ca khyātyā tapatyevaṃ haiva śriyā yaśasā ca tapati yo 'syā etadevaṃ turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ veda //3//
GV05brupsb5u:703: saiṣā gāyatry etasmiṃs turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:707: tasmād yad idānīṃ dvau vivadamānāv eyātam aham adarśam aham aśrauṣam iti /
GV05brupsb5u:708: ya evaṃ brūyād aham adarśam iti /
GV05brupsb5u:710: tad vai tat satyaṃ bale pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05brupsb5u:713: tasmād āhur balaṃ satyād ogīya iti /
GV05brupsb5u:714: evaṃ v eṣā gāyatry adhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:718: tad yad gayāṃs tatre tasmād gāyatrī nāma /
GV05brupsb5u:719: sa yām evāmūṃ sāvitrīm anvāhaiṣaiva sā /
GV05brupsb5u:720: sa yasmā anvāha tasya prāṇāṃs trāyate // BrhUp_5,14.4 //
GV05brupsb5u:721: BrhUpBh_5,14.4 saiṣā tripadoktā yā trailokyatraividyaprāṇalakṣaṇā gāyatryetasmiṃścaturthe turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:728: tathā mūrtāmūrtātmakaṃ jagattripadā gāyatryāditye pratiṣṭhitā tadrasatvātsaha tribhiḥ pādaiḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:732: kathaṃ prasiddhatetyāha-tasmādyadidānīmeva dvau vivadamānau viruddhaṃ vadamānāveyātāmāgaccheyātāmahamadarśaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:733: dṛṣṭavānanasmītyanya āhāhamaśrauṣaṃ tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ na tathā tadvastviti tayorya evaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:734: brūyādahamadrākṣamiti tasmā eva śraddadhyāma napunaryo brūyādahamaśrauṣamiti /
GV05brupsb5u:735: śroturmṛṣā śravaṇamapi saṃbhavati na tu cakṣuṣo mṛṣā darśanam /
GV05brupsb5u:737: tasmātsatyapratipattihetutvātsatyaṃ cakṣustasminsatye cakṣuṣi saha tribhiritaraiḥ pādaisturīyaṃ padaṃ pratiṣṭhitamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:738: uktaṃ ca sa ādityaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti cakṣuṣīti /
GV05brupsb5u:740: kiṃ punastadbalamityāha-prāṇo vai balaṃ tasminprāṇe bale pratiṣṭhitaṃ satyam /
GV05brupsb5u:741: tathā coktaṃ sūtre tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ceti /
GV05brupsb5u:742: yasmādbale satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tasmādāhurbalaṃ satyādogīya ojīya ojastaramityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:743: loke 'pi yasminhi yadāśritaṃ bhavati tasmādāśritādāśrayasya balavattaratvaṃ prasiddham /
GV05brupsb5u:744: na hi durbalaṃ balavataḥ kvacidāśrayabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GV05brupsb5u:745: evamuktanyāyena u eṣā gāyatryadhyātmamadhyātme prāṇe pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:749: sarvaṃ vedāḥ karmāṇi phalaṃ ca saivaṃ gāyatrī prāṇarūpā satī jagata ātmā /
GV05brupsb5u:751: ke punargayāḥ prāṇā vāgādayo vai gayāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:756: sa ācārya upanīya māṇavakamaṣṭavarṣaṃ yāmevāmūṃ gāyatrīṃ sāvitrīṃ savitṛdevatākāmanvāha pacchordharcaśaḥ samastāṃ ca /
GV05brupsb5u:757: eṣaiva sā sākṣātprāṇo jagata ātmā māṇavakāya samarpitehedānīṃ vyākhyātā nānyā sa ācāryo yasmai māṇavakāyānvāhānuvakti tasya māṇavakasya gayānprāṇāṃsrāyate narakādipatanāt //4//
GV05brupsb5u:759: tāṃ haitām eke sāvitrīm anuṣṭubham anvāhuḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:764: yadi ha vā apy evaṃvid bahv iva pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tad gāyatryā ekaṃ cana padaṃ prati // BrhUp_5,14.5 //
GV05brupsb5u:767: vākca śarīre sarasvatī tāmeva hi vācaṃ sarasvatīṃ māṇavakāyānubrūma ityetadvadantaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:768: na tathā kuryānna tathā vidyādyatta āhurmṛṣaiva tat /
GV05brupsb5u:772: prāṇa ukte vākca sarasvatī cānye ta prāṇāḥ sarvaṃ māṇavakāya samarpitaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:773: kiñcedaṃ prāsaṅgikamuktvā gāyatrīvidaṃ stauti-yadi ha vā apyevaṃvidbahviva na hi
GV05brupsb5u:774: tasya sarvātmano bahu nāmāsti kicitsarvātmakatvādviduṣaḥ pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tatpratigrahajātaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:777: sa ya imāṃs trīṃl lokān pūrṇān pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat prathamaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:778: atha yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etad dvitīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:779: atha yāvad idaṃ prāṇi yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat tṛtīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:780: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:783: BrhUpBh_5,14.6 sa ya imāṃsrīnsa yo gāyatrīvidimānbhūrādīṃsrīngo 'śvādidhanapūrṇāṃllokānpratigṛhṇīyātsa
GV05brupsb5u:785: tena bhuktaṃ syānna tvadhikadoṣotpādakaḥ sa pratigrahaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:786: atha punaryāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yastāvatpratigṛhṇīyātso 'syā etattṛtīyaṃ padamāpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:789: pādatrayasamamapi yadi kaścitpratigṛhṇīyāttatpādatrayavijñānaphalasyaiva kṣayakāraṇaṃ na tvanyasya doṣasya kartṛtve kṣamam /
GV05brupsb5u:792: dātā pratigrahītā ca yadyapyevaṃ saṃbhāvyate nāsau pratigraho 'parādhakṣamaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:794: athāsyā etadeva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:795: yaccaitannaiva kenacana kenacidapi pratigraheṇā'pyaṃ naiva prāpyamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:797: etānyapi naivā'pyāni kenacitkalpayitvaivamuktaṃ paramārthataḥ kuta u etāvatpratigṛhṇoyāttrailokyādisamam /
GV05brupsb5u:801: gāyatry asy ekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadi /
GV05brupsb5u:804: namas te turīyāya darśatāya padāya parorajase /
GV05brupsb5u:806: yaṃ dviṣyād asāv asmai kāmo mā samardhīti vā /
GV05brupsb5u:807: na haivāsmai sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate yasmā evam upatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb5u:808: aham adaḥ prāpam iti vā // BrhUp_5,14.7 //
GV05brupsb5u:809: BrhUpBh_5,14.7 tasyā upasthānaṃ tasyā gāyatryā upasthānamupetya sthānaṃ namaskaraṇamanena mantreṇa /
GV05brupsb5u:810: kau'sau mantra ityāha-he gāyatryasi bhavasi trailokyapādenaikapadī trayīvidyārūpeṇa dvitīyena dvipadī /
GV05brupsb5u:813: evaṃ caturbhiḥ pādairupāsakaiḥ padyase jñāyase 'taḥ paraṃ pareṇa nirupādhikena svenā'tmanāpadasi /
GV05brupsb5u:814: avidyamānaṃ padaṃ yasyāstava yena padyase sā tvamapadasi yasmānnahi padyase neti netyātmatvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:815: ato vyavahāraviṣayāya namabhte turīyāya darśatāya padāya poradase /
GV05brupsb5u:816: asau śatruḥ pāpmā tvatprāptivighnakaro 'dastadātmanaḥ kāryaṃ yattvatprāptivighnakartṛtvaṃ mā prāpanmaiva prāpnotu /
GV05brupsb5u:818: yaṃ dviṣyādyaṃ prati dveṣaṃ kuryātsvayaṃ vidvāṃstaṃ pratyanenopasthānamasau śatruramukanāmeti
GV05brupsb5u:819: nāma gṛhṇīyādasmai yajñadattāyābhipretaḥ kāmo mā samṛddhi samṛddhiṃ mā prāpnotviti vopatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb5u:820: na haivāsmai devadattāya sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate /
GV05brupsb5u:824: asāvado mā prāpadityāditrayāṇāṃ mantrapadānāṃ yathākāmaṃ vikalpaḥ //7//
GV05brupsb5u:826: etad dha vai taj janako vaideho buḍilam āśvatarāśvim uvāca -- yan nu ho tad gāyatrīvid abrūthāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:828: mukhaṃ hy asyāḥ samrāṇ na vidāṃ cakareti hovāca /
GV05brupsb5u:830: yadi ha vā api bahv ivāgnāv abhyādadhati sarvam eva tat saṃdahati /
GV05brupsb5u:831: evaṃ haivaivaṃvid yady api bahv iva pāpaṃ kurute sarvam eva tat saṃpsāya śuddhaḥ pūto 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ saṃbhavati // BrhUp_5,14.8 //
GV05brupsb5u:832: BrhUpBh_5,14.8 gāyatryā mukhavidhānāyārthavāda ucyate-etaddha kila vai smaryate /
GV05brupsb5u:833: tattatra gāyatrīvijñānaviṣaye janako vaideho buḍilo nāmato 'śvatarāśvasyāpatyamāśvatarāśvistaṃ kiloktavān /
GV05brupsb5u:834: yannu iti vitarke ho aho ityetattadyattvaṃ gāyatrīvidbrūthā gāyatrīvidasmīti yadabrūthāḥ kimidaṃ tasya vacaso 'nanurūpam /
GV05brupsb5u:835: atha kathaṃ yadi gāyatrīvitpratigrahadoṣeṇa hastobhūto vahasīti /
GV05brupsb5u:836: sa pratyāha rājñā smārito mukhaṃ gāyatryā hi yasmādasyā he samrāṇna vidāñcakāra na vijñātavānasmīti hovāca /
GV05brupsb5u:838: śṛṇu tarhi tasyā gāyatryā agnireva mukham /
GV05brupsb5u:839: yadi ha vā api bahvivendhanamagnāvabhyādadhati laukikāḥ sarvameva tatsaṃdahatyevendhanamagnirevaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:841: yadyapi bahviva pāpaṃ kurute pratigrahādidoṣaṃ tatsarvaṃ pāpajātaṃ saṃpsāya bhakṣayitvā śuddho 'gnivatpūtaśca tasmātpratigrahadoṣādgāyatryātmājaro 'mṛtaśca saṃbhavati //8//
GV05brupsb5u:845: tat tvam pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye /
GV05brupsb5u:846: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:847: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi /
GV05brupsb5u:848: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram /
GV05brupsb5u:849: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara /
GV05brupsb5u:850: agne naya supathā rāye 'smān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV05brupsb5u:851: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema // BrhUp_5,15.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:852: BrhUpBh_5,15.1 yo jñānakarmasamuccayakārī so 'ntakāla ādityaṃ prārthayati /
GV05brupsb5u:853: asti ca prasaṅgo gāyatryāsturīyaḥ pādo hi saḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:855: hiraṇyamayena jyotirmayena pātreṇa yathā pātreṇeṣṭaṃ vastvapidhīyata evamidaṃ satyākhyaṃ brahma jyotirmayena maṇḍalenāpihitamivāsamāhitacetasāmadṛśyatvāttaducyate
GV05brupsb5u:856: satyasyāpihitaṃ mukhaṃ mukhyaṃ svarūpaṃ tadapidhānaṃ pātramapidhānamiva darśanapratibandhakāraṇaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:857: tattvaṃ he pūṣañjagataḥ poṣaṇatpūṣā savitāpāvṛṇvapāvṛtaṃ kuru darśanapratibandhakāraṇamapanayetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:858: satyadharmāya satyaṃ dharmo 'sya mama so 'haṃ satyadharmā tasmai tvadātmabhūtāyetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:862: sa hi sarvasya jagata ātmā cakṣuśca sansarvaṃ paśyatyeko vā gacchatītyekarṣiḥ“sūrya ekākī carati“iti mantravarṇāt /
GV05brupsb5u:863: yama sarvaṃ hi jagataḥ saṃyamanaṃ tvatkṛtam /
GV05brupsb5u:864: sūrya suṣṭhu vīrayate rasānraśmīnprāṇāndhiyo vā jagata iti /
GV05brupsb5u:865: prājāpatya prajāpaterīśvarasyāpatyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasya vā he prājāpatya vyūha vigamaya raśmīn /
GV05brupsb5u:866: samūha saṃkṣipā'tmanastejo yenāhaṃ śaknuyāṃ tvatsvarūpamañjasā draṣṭam /
GV05brupsb5u:868: yatte tava rūpaṃ sarvakalyāṇānāmatiśayena kalyāṇaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tatte paśyāmi /
GV05brupsb5u:870: yo 'sau bhūrbhuvaḥsvarvyāhṛtyavayavaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣākṛtitvātpuruṣaḥ so 'hamasmi bhavāmi /
GV05brupsb5u:871: aharamiti copaniṣada uktatvādādityacākṣuṣayostadevedaṃ parāmṛśyate so 'hamasmyamṛtamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:872: mamāmṛtasya satyasya śarīrapāte śarīrastho yaḥ prāṇo vāyuḥ so 'nilaṃ bāhyaṃ vāyumeva pratigacchatu /
GV05brupsb5u:873: tathānyā devatāḥ svāṃ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gacchantu /
GV05brupsb5u:875: athedānīmātmanaḥ saṃkalpabhūtāṃ manasi vyavasthitāmagnidevatāṃ prārthayate-oṃ krato /
GV05brupsb5u:879: he oṃ he krato smara smartavyamantakāle hi tvatsmaraṇavaśādiṣṭā gatiḥ prāpyate 'taḥ prārthyate yanmayā kṛtaṃ tatsmara punaruktirādarārthā /
GV05brupsb5u:880: kiñca he 'gne naya prāpaya supathā śobhanena mārgeṇa rāye dhanāya karmaphalaprāptaya ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:881: na dakṣiṇena kṛṣṇena punarāvṛttiyuktena kiṃ tarhi śuklenaiva supathāsmānviśvāni sarvāṇi he deva vayunāni prajñānāni sarvaprāṇināṃ vidvān /
GV05brupsb5u:882: kiñca yuyodhyapanaya viyojayāsmadasmatto juhurāṇaṃ kuṭilamenaḥ pāpaṃ pāpajātaṃ sarvam /
GV05brupsb5u:883: tena pāpena viyuktā vayameṣyāma uttareṇa pathā tvatprasādāt /
GV05brupsb5u:884: kintu vayaṃ tubhyaṃ paricaryāṃ kartuṃ na śaknumo bhūyiṣṭhāṃ bahutamāṃ te tubhyaṃ namauktiṃ namaskāravacanaṃ vidhema namaskāroktyā paricaremetyarthaḥ
